Sentinel Eriel:
May the whisper of the wind bring peace to your soul. My name is Eriel. I refuse to recognize the place with the Dark Elves, so I volunteered to guard the Neutral Zone and make sure that they do not enter our forest.
By the way, the Neutral Zone is located right behind this bridge. And if you go further south, you will find yourself in Gludio. That Human settlement is the closest to the Elves.
